segments.text: Excuse me , I ’ d like to apply for a library card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly.Here ’ s an application form.Do you have proof of residence ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What sort of proof do you need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A driver ’ s license or something showing that you live in this city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m a student from out of state , so I don ’ t have a local driver ’ s license .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a current electricity or gas bill in your name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The phone bill ’ s in my name .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ ll do.Bring the most recent one in with your completed application , and we ’ ll issue you a temporary library card right away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take to get the regular one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ ll be mailed to you within two weeks , but you can borrow books on the temporary card .
segments.speaker: S2
